attributes.action: Scrap any plans to introduce ID cards in light of the recent data loss
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the recent debacle resulting in the loss of sensitive personal records about 25 million people, and the refusal of the Government to accept any responsibility for the situation, it is completely unacceptable for the ID card scheme to go ahead. 

ID cards will hold even more sensitive information and it is clear that insufficient safeguards exist to ensure that the date remains secure at all times.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
